0.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-dymo-print
0.0.1.description:
Quickly print your DYMO labels from within your WP E-Commerce sales page.

The WP E-Commerce Dymo Print plugin adds a quick connection with your DYMO labelwriter within your GetShopped WP E-Commerce shop. Now you are able to print shipping address labels in a second!

For more information, check out our website.

Free version

This free version may be used as is. If you want more options and support you can buy WP E-Commerce DYMO Print Pro for only € 15,00. The plugin adds links on the sales page and purchase log detail page to allow shop managers to print out DYMO labels on the fly. This is useful for a lot of shops and makes live a lot easier ;-) .

Features

  • Print DYMO shipping labels in a second
  • Localisation: English & Dutch
